mapper.insert: insert into blog_comments(user_id, blog_id, parent_id, reply_id, reply_user_id, content, likes, status, create_time, update_time) values (#{userId}, #{blogId}, #{parentId}, #{replyId}, #{replyUserId}, #{content}, #{likes}, #{status}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})

insert into blog(user_id, title, images, content, tags, address, likes, favorites, comments, create_time, update_time) values (#{userId}, #{title}, #{images}, #{content}, #{tags}, #{address}, #{likes}, #{favorites}, #{comments}, now(), now())
